name: docmost
description: Docmost is an open-source, self-hosted documentation and knowledge management platform. It offers spaces, pages, search, permissions, and a clean collaborative editor, aiming to be an alternative to tools like Confluence or Notion for teams.
features: Collaborative editing: Work on documents simultaneously with team members and see changes in real-time.
Workspace organization: Create spaces for different teams or projects with separate page hierarchies and permissions.
Rich text editor: Format content with headings, lists, tables, code blocks, and embedded media for comprehensive documentation.
Full-text search: Find information quickly across all pages and spaces with instant search results and highlighting.
Version history: Track document changes over time and restore previous versions when needed for content recovery.
Permission control: Set read, write, and admin permissions at space and page levels for granular access management.
Page templates: Create reusable document structures for consistent formatting across team documentation.
Export options: Download pages as Markdown or PDF for offline use and integration with external systems.
